content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good to meet you, Nesibe! Thank you for considering my apartment. Based on our discussion, I propose a rental price of €1,000 per month. This is a fair and competitive rate for a 25 square meter apartment in this location. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1000 Euro per month. Thank you for your offer. I will pay the first month's rent in advance.

I would like to ask if there are any other costs associated with the rental, such as maintenance or utilities, that I should be aware of.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Nesibe! Yes, there are some additional costs associated with the rental that I would like to clarify. The monthly rent includes basic utilities such as electricity and water, but not gas or internet. You will be responsible for paying any additional charges for these services separately.

Additionally, there may be minor maintenance costs that arise during your tenancy, such as replacing a broken light bulb or fixing a small leak. These costs will be shared between you and I, and we can discuss any issues that arise in detail when they occur.

Other than that, I believe we have covered all the important details of the rental agreement. Is there anything else you would like to discuss before we finalize the agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:

One last question: How long is the lease agreement for?

I agree to the price of 1000 Euro per month. Thank you for your offer. I will pay the first month's rent in advance.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Nesibe! The lease agreement is for a minimum of one year, with the option to renew for another year if both parties agree. During the initial one-year period, you will be required to provide a security deposit of €500, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you have fulfilled all the terms of the agreement.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know. I'm looking forward to having you as my tenant!
name: Heinrich Heine
